definitions.text: the act of clasping another person in the arms (as in greeting or affection)
the state of taking in or encircling
examples: an island in the embrace of the sea

definitions.text: a close affectionate and protective acceptance
examples: his willing embrace of new ideas
in the bosom of the family

definitions.text: include in scope; include as part of something broader; have as one's sphere or territory
examples: This group encompasses a wide range of people from different backgrounds
this should cover everyone in the group

definitions.text: squeeze (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness
examples: He hugged her close to him

definitions.text: take up the cause, ideology, practice, method, of someone and use it as one's own
